name: TouchTheCrucifex (Week 106 Theme: 'Oh No!')
description:
You're a lost and roaming ball who lost a crucial faith, touch any cross 7 times to arise victoriously and regain it again.

Controls-Arrows are used to move the ball

Wanted to get a finished game project done as it was advised for me to finish and show off at least one as I'm working on several projects that are taking long due to large scope. Finished in under 2 days.  Done in Godot 3.1

The game comes in optimized GLES2 versions and pretty looking GLES3 versions. The HTML version runs on the GLES2 version.
